TargetName: SOW-022: Live project directory FileTree refresh
Statement: DEL-02-01 implements scope item SOW-022 which defines the live project directory FileTree that refreshes periodically and on focus/visibility changes to detect external filesystem changes.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition Scope Ledger: SOW-022 maps to PKG-02 / DEL-02-01 / OBJ-005.

TargetName: OBJ-005: Desktop UI supports intended operator workflow
Statement: DEL-02-01 supports objective OBJ-005 (Desktop UI supports intended operator workflow) as explicitly listed in the decomposition SupportsObjectives column.
EvidenceQuote: OBJ-005 -- confirmed via decomposition (SupportsObjectives column explicitly lists OBJ-005 for DEL-02-01)
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition deliverables table: DEL-02-01 SupportsObjectives = OBJ-005.

TargetName: DEL-03-01: Working Root Binding & Session Boot
Statement: DEL-02-01 requires projectRoot binding from DEL-03-01. FileTree operates against the currently selected projectRoot; the tree updates when root changes. A stub/mock projectRoot may suffice for initial development.
EvidenceQuote: projectRoot binding (DEL-03-01 or existing root selection in ResizableLayout.tsx)
Notes: FACT. Explicitly listed as prerequisite in Procedure. Guidance notes stub/mock may suffice (ASSUMPTION), but the dependency relationship is explicit.

Statement: DEL-02-01 produces FileTree refresh logic that DEL-02-04 consumes for visual styling and interaction polish. Specification explicitly excludes visual styling as covered by DEL-02-04.
EvidenceQuote: FileTree visual styling and interaction polish (covered by DEL-02-04 and UI_POLISH_EXECUTION_PLAN workstream F)
Notes: FACT. Specification explicitly names DEL-02-04 as the consumer of FileTree styling/polish scope.

TargetName: DEL-02-02: Portal-Pipeline Navigation & Deliverable Key Semantics
Statement: DEL-02-01 FileTree refresh may need to signal deliverable-relevant filesystem changes to shared deliverables state managed by DEL-02-02. The boundary between FileTree refresh and shared state refresh should be clearly defined.
EvidenceQuote: PLAN SS 2 describes shared deliverables state at page-level used by both PORTAL and PIPELINE views
Notes: FACT. Guidance C5 explicitly identifies the interface between FileTree refresh and shared deliverables state (SOW-024, DEL-02-02). Direction is DOWNSTREAM because DEL-02-01 may produce signals consumed by the shared state.

TargetName: DEL-05-02: Execution Root Scaffolding + Layout Conformance
Statement: DEL-02-01 FileTree displays the execution root layout structure defined by SPEC SS 1 and implemented by DEL-05-02. The FileTree must render the folder structure that DEL-05-02 scaffolds.
EvidenceQuote: SPEC SS 1 (Execution Root Layout) -- FileTree displays this structure
Notes: FACT. Specification Standards table explicitly states FileTree displays the execution root layout. Datasheet REF-03 confirms. The layout definition flows from DEL-05-02 to DEL-02-01.
